GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an object with individual review information

review.title: Build you own tour de Yorkshire
review.review_body: Cold rain pours on the faces of your team of cyclists, you pulled to the front of the pack early and now your taking on exhaustion cards like there is not tomorrow.

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of objects with comment information for a single review

comments.body: My dog loved this game too!
comments.author: mallionaire

comments.body: I didn't know dogs could play games
comments.author: philippaclaire9

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: requires an object, has no response

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an object with comment posted, requires an object

example input.body: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc id pulvinar urna

comment.body: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc id pulvinar urna
comment.author: mallionaire

GET /api/comments.description: serves an array of all comments

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes comment by the comment id provided, sends no response

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
